text: Veendum Oru Aadyaraathri is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film directed by Bhaskar Raj. ==Cast== *Shanavas *Santhakumari *Murali *Bala Singh as Rajan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Veendum Oru Aadyaraathri
